text: Nan Talese (n√©e Ahearn; born December 19, 1933) is an American editor. Talese is the Senior Vice President of Doubleday. Since 1990, Talese has been the Publisher and Editorial Director of her own imprint, Nan A. Talese/Doubleday, known for its literary works. In 1959, Talese married The New York Times journalist Gay Talese. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:American editors Category:Writers from New York (state)
title: Nan A. Talese
